doc.field: ENDATA DATA> TERMINATES WORK ON CONTRACT

Endata Inc said it terminated development work on a previously announced contract with Educational Testing Services>. Endata said that under terms of the contract Educational Testing asked it to terminate development of an advanced image processing system integration project and to return all projected-related equipment. Endata said termination of the project will not materially affect its operating results. Separately, Endata said it bought the assets and business of three service centers from Midcom Inc> for an undisclosed amount. Reuter
